thread.title: Office Envy: PowerSupply's Homey Alexandria HQ
thread.title_full: Office Envy: PowerSupply's Homey Alexandria HQ

author: Chris Bing
title: Office Envy: PowerSupply's Homey Alexandria HQ
text:
share Power Supply base of operations in Alexandria, Va. / Credit: courtesy of co. 
Power Supply is an e-commerce marketplace that coordinates the delivery and pickup of healthy and balanced meals throughout the D.C. area. These lunches and dinners are designed for active, metropolitan customers that are looking for a healthy, great tasting yet convenient, quick to serve meal at an affordable price. The pickups/delivers are typically scheduled and paid for based on a weekly or monthly schedule, rather than a daily, on-demand menu. 
The Power Supply Va.-based team is a close-knit group of less than 20 employees, complete with social media strategists, sales people and even professional chefs. 
Earlier this year, the company orchestrated an acquisition in Los Angeles, effectively expanding their business to the West Coast. We decided to focus on the birthplace of Power Supply, and took a tour of their Alexandria office. Check it out... Photo Credit: courtesy of co.
